name: Missed call follow up with Salesmsg
description:
Your customers are calling you. Can you answer right now?

If not, you’re missing your chance to:
1. Sell that customer your products or services.
2. Give that customer real-time support.
3. Turn that customer’s dissatisfaction into praise.
4. Answer their questions that lead to sales.

Why miss those opportunities? Just text them instead.

With this one-step automation from Salesmsg, your customers will automatically receive a text message when you can’t answer their call.

Rather than listening to the phone ring, your customers will see a well-timed, helpful text that reads: “Sorry I missed your call! I’ll get back to you ASAP.”

Perfect for sales and support teams, this simple SMS automation instantly makes your customers feel heard and appreciated—and sets a positive tone for your next conversation.

Best of all? This one text ensures you never again miss your chance to connect with customers. Ever.

This template was created by a 3rd party and has not been tested by Make. For questions, please reach out to the Salesmsg team.
